UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, LIKED, RP_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ? AND NOTICE = 'N'
UPDATE BOARD SET LIKED = LIKED+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_WRITER, CATEGORY_NO, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, 1, ?, ?)
